name: Mission: Recontain
description:
Science Researcher party was missing 16 hrs ago, it's your job to retrieve the load.
this is a submission for Devleague Round 2. we have 24 hours to make a game.

THEME: 
"Containment" there's not much gameplay base theme here, but the story rely on you to contain the load from the depths of the sea.

CONTROLS:
Arrow = Movement
